headline: Insider Watch: 3 CEOs Buying the Dip
summary: Large-cap stocks CHD, LLY, and VTRS have seen their respective CEOs make purchases over the last month. What do they see?

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid CHD and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Church & Dwight’s stock price fell to $93. Shareholders have lost 17% of their capital, which is disappointing considering the S&P 500 has climbed by 9.7%. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
